Makefile: top-level Makefile

This Makefile contains only repo-specific logic and uses included makefiles to supply common targets (javascriptlint, jsstyle, restdown, etc.), which are used by other repos as well.

 

        		
      

    
      

        
          

  



Tools


        		
        
          
NPM		 = npm



        		
      

    
      

        
          

  



Files


        		
        
          
JS_FILES	:= $(shell find lib examples tests -name '*.js')
JSL_FILES_NODE   = $(JS_FILES)
JSSTYLE_FILES	 = $(JS_FILES)
JSL_CONF_NODE	 = jsl.node.conf

.PHONY: all
all:
	$(NPM) install

.PHONY: test
test:
	node tests/tst.inherit.js
	node tests/tst.verror.js
	node tests/tst.werror.js
	@echo all tests passed

include ./Makefile.targ
